moves.1. e4: A very common opening by white. The fight for the center begins.
moves.1... a5: Black uses a5 to let his rook out.
moves.2. Bc4: White brings out his bishop to c4.
moves.3. Qh5: White brings his queen to h5.
moves.3... Rh6: Black attacks whites queen by bringing his rook to h6.
moves.4. Qxf7#: Whites queen goes to f7 and since whites bishop on c4 protects whites queen it is a checkmate and the game is over.
